name: ShareFlow
text: A platform where users can effortlessly share files online. ShareFlow offers a seamless experience for sharing documents, images, videos, and more.

name: Rezume
text: Rezume is an online platform built to help individuals create professional resumes by simply filling a form within minutes or check their existing resume strength.

name: Coinix
text: Coinix empowers users to stay informed and make strategic decisions in the dynamic crypto market.  Build on React and hosted on vercel.

name: CodeChamp Website
text: CodeChamps Community Website is the portfolio of Community of developers which allows users to watch past sessions, Apply for interships and many more
